subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Lakers lost to the Celtics in 2008 when Pau Gasol seemed to shrink in the face of Boston’s ferocity, but few people would consider his game soft these days.
snippet: The Lakers lost to the Celtics in 2008 when Pau Gasol seemed to shrink in the face of Boston’s ferocity, but few people would consider his game soft these days.
